column5: This comfortable loft is amazingly situated to enjoy the best that Houston has to offer. You can sleep up to 6 people in this deluxe, 1-bedroom, 1-bath, modern apartment. One king bed, 1 couch bed, 1 futon, and a regular couch. It is a super easy walk across the street to BBVA Compass Stadium, 2 block to George R Brown Convention Center, 3 blocks to Minute Maid Park, and a 5 minute Uber ride to the Toyota Center. You can be in Downtown in minutes for the best restaurants, bars, and coffee shops!
column8: 2 blocks to GRB Two Room Loft in Downtown Houston
